Once upon a time, there was a gentle cat named Fluffy. Fluffy lived in a small house with a big family. Fluffy liked to play and touch soft things. One day, Fluffy saw a big ball of yarn.
Fluffy wanted to play with the yarn, but Mommy said, "No, Fluffy, don't touch!" But Fluffy did not listen. Fluffy ignored Mommy and played with the yarn.

amazed. It was a great garden, filled with colourful flowers and buzzing bees. The bird was so pleased. It sang a joyful song, feeling the warm sunshine on its feathers.
Suddenly, the bird heard a familiar voice. It was the voice of a little girl!
The bird flapped its wings and flew down to the girl. With a smile, the girl said, "Would you like to join me in the garden?"
The bird was overjoyed. It eagerly flew around the garden with the girl. Then, when the sun had set, the bird took off again and soared into the night sky.
